# replace

**Type Property**

An animation that replaces the layers of one symbol-based image with those of another.

## Declaration

```swift
static var replace: ReplaceSymbolEffect { get }
```

## Symbol content transitions

- **automatic**: A transition that applies the default animation to a symbol-based image in a context-sensitive manner.

items.description: A transition that applies the default animation to a symbol-based image in a context-sensitive manner.
